description:
While still based on the latest Debian GNU/Linux 12 “Bookworm” operating system series, Raspberry Pi OS is now powered by the Linux 6.6 LTS kernel series, which is a major upgrade from Linux kernel 6.1 LTS used in previous releases.

The post Raspberry Pi OS Is Now Powered by Linux 6.6 LTS, Improves Raspberry Pi 5 Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Raspberry Pi OS Is Now Powered by Linux 6.6 LTS, Improves Raspberry Pi 5 Support

description:
Free and open-source “OG” media player VLC surpasses 5 billion downloads. VLC, the popular video player software, has reached a major milestone by surpassing five billion downloads, as reported by the Lowpass newsletter. The VideoLAN project, which develops and maintains VLC, has recorded these downloads since February 2005.

The post VLC Player Hits 5 Billion Downloads, Prepares for WebAssembly, Vision Pro App appeared first on Linux Today.
title: VLC Player Hits 5 Billion Downloads, Prepares for WebAssembly, Vision Pro App

description:
Coming just a week after KDE Plasma 6.0.1, the KDE Plasma 6.0.2 update is here to fix a bug that caused the Night Color feature to fail to work on systems with certain GPUs and fix a crash in the Plasma Discover package manager that occurred when searching for some common terms like “libreoffice”.

The post KDE Plasma 6.0.2 Improves Night Color, Discover, Plasma Wayland & More appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KDE Plasma 6.0.2 Improves Night Color, Discover, Plasma Wayland & More

description:
March’s KaOS release brings a much-anticipated Plasma 6 desktop environment with Wayland as default and waving goodbye to GTK2 in KaOS.

The post KaOS 2024.03 Launches with Plasma 6.0 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KaOS 2024.03 Launches with Plasma 6.0

description:
Speedometer 3.0 browser benchmark launches, boosting web app responsiveness testing with input from Apple, Google, Microsoft, and Mozilla.

The post Cross-Industry Giants Unite for Speedometer 3.0 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Cross-Industry Giants Unite for Speedometer 3.0
